categories: Category:Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1

nodes.text: Escape from the Death Star  (short story)

"Escape from the Death Star" is a short story written by Ivan Cohen that was published in the anthologies Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1 and The Original Trilogy Stories. It adapts Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope from after the garbage compactor to leaving the Alderaan system.
